body: I finally adopted a #dog! Meet Luna, she’s a rescue and already feels like part of the #family. Can’t wait to make so many memories together. #rescuedog #doglover

comments.body: Aww, congrats! Luna is such a cute name. How’s she adjusting so far?
@56565 Thanks! She’s doing great so far. A bit shy at first, but she’s warming up quickly. Lots of tail wags already!
Congrats on adopting! Rescues are the best. What breed is Luna?
@67676 She’s a mix of lab and shepherd, we think! Hard to tell for sure, but she’s got such a sweet personality.
That’s awesome! Can’t wait to see all the adventures you two go on together. Any plans for her first big outing?
@78787 We’re planning a trip to the park this weekend! I’m excited to see how she does off-leash in a big open space.
Luna is lucky to have found you! Do you think she’ll be a cuddler, or is she more independent?
@34343 She’s definitely a cuddler! Loves curling up next to me on the couch already. I think she’s going to be my new shadow!
This is so heartwarming! Rescuing is such a great thing to do. Does she have any favorite toys yet?
@89898 She loves her squeaky ball! It’s hilarious watching her chase it around the house.
